text: Koraa, ‘tomaloke yisakalaka ansi sthapana karaa sihamtara majata ene konoba ache neki yiye satyara patha nirdesa karae’? Koraa, ‘allahe'i satyara patha nirdesa karae. Teneha’le (koraacona) anugatyara bechi hakadara kona? Yijane satyara patha nirdesa diye te'om, ne yaka patha nedekhuraale patha bicarai napaya se'ijana? Eteke tomalokara ki haiche? Tomaloke kenekuraa bicara karaa
